# simd_mix(_:_:_:)

**Function**

Returns an elementwise linearly interpolated value between two vectors.

## Declaration

```swift
func simd_mix(_ x: simd_double8, _ y: simd_double8, _ t: simd_double8) -> simd_double8
```

## Interpolation Functions

- **simd_smoothstep(_:_:_:)**: Returns an elementwise smoothly interpolated value between two vectors.
